3 Tangents

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw > Circle > 3 Tangents
Shortcut: C, T, 3
Commands: circletangent3 | ct3

Description:

Draws a circle that is tangential to three entities.

Procedure:

  1. Specify the first tangential entity.
  2. Specify the second tangential entity.
  3. Specify the third tangential entity.
